resources.string: Due to audio playback latency, calibration must be done before proceeding. After the initial calibration, you will be able to repeat it later.\n\nFour metronome clicks will be played. Touch the screen at the next (fifth) click.
Choose one of the modes. Its description will appear here.
For notating durations in between of basic notes\' durations, dotted notes are used. This mode is sufficient for notating most simpler rhythms.
This mode is used for notating complex rhythms which contain both dotted notes and triplets. Note that it could take more time for notation than in other two modes.
Instead of dotted notes, triplets are used. This mode is used for notating jazz, "swing" rhythms.
Play the rhythm by touching the red surface.\nNotation will be shown after the metronome is stopped.
